works.description:
The entire content is my original article
 
copyrighted in 2004 and used without my permission.

Is there any way to find out the owner of these blogs? There is no  
information listed on any of the infringing blogs. I believe it is an  
affiliate client of mine in which case I would like to bill them and also 

to provide me with more insight into their business practices, as I would 

not thus find them trustworthy.

Also google: please focus more attention on this problem, I find dozens
and  
dozens of copyright violations every time I look. Often the copycats
appear  
higher in google search results. Previous violators still have my original
 
content on their blogs (yes, I filed a DMCA)as well as Adsense. It really 

makes for an unfair playing field for those of us who work hard to create 

original content and we are not compensated for the hours put in making  
complaints. Thanks!
